issue.title: Unable to spawn robots in Ignition

content.raw:
@{557058:14b7fd50-d65a-47a8-825c-fa89681d07bd}'s suggestion should help you get models spawned, but you may have other adverse effects for trying to use a different model version. Ideally you'd use the exact models listed in the world files.

Do you see any errors printed about failing to download models? Your system should be trying to download the correct model as listed on the world file. Also make sure you're running all the latest code by running `sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade`.
content.html:
@Arthur Schang's suggestion should help you get models spawned, but you may have other adverse effects for trying to use a different model version. Ideally you'd use the exact models listed in the world files.

Do you see any errors printed about failing to download models? Your system should be trying to download the correct model as listed on the world file. Also make sure you're running all the latest code by running sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade.
